sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for accurate weighing of materials.
sections.scope: Applicable to weighing operations in all laboratories.
procedure: Ensure the balance is clean and leveled.
Switch ON the balance and allow stabilization.
Place container on balance and tare.
Add material carefully and record weight.
precautions: Wear appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) when handling materials.
Avoid overloading the balance beyond its capacity.
Handle materials with care to prevent spills.
Ensure the balance is on a stable surface.
Keep the weighing area free from drafts and vibrations.
Use clean and dry containers for weighing.
Do not touch the weighing pan directly with hands.
Calibrate the balance regularly as per manufacturer instructions.
Record weights immediately to avoid errors.
Avoid air drafts and vibration during weighing.
